name: Goal!
overview: IT'S A WHOLE NEW WORLD OF SOCCER ACTION! The shots. The passes. Sharp graphics and sophisticated strategies. If you're goal is to beat the best in the world at their own game, get into GOAL! for Game Boy. And get ready for the challenge of your life! - Super competition: choose from international field of 16 teams - 3 super modes: Match Play (1-or-2- player), Super Cup (1-player in round-robin tournament), and Penalty Kick Shootout - 3 super perspectives, including a full field view that shows the positions of all players - Super moves... kick, block, head, bicycle kick, pass, or steal - Super strategy: choose from 4 defensive formations
